Text: RE yoNo need to perk up for me I should learn to live with you on days like this Yes I do need to packstart laundry Im flex for dinner Two suggestions Eggs and bacon mebiscuits you Dishes me Walk with dogs us Meet at home slip into our running gear grab the dogs and go to Memorial for a jog Stop on the way home and pick something up for dinner veggies with tofu Original Message From Sanchez Monique mailto Sent Tuesday May PM To Subject yo hey there wondering what youd like to do tonight for dinner i know you probably need to do stuff like pack for germ i am supremely grouchy i will do my best to perk up for you when i get home i forgot shoes so i will not be joining sue at hanks my plan was to go homestart drinkingand do some desk worksparebedroom work just shoot me a line when you get a chancelatersky Mo winmaildat

RE Hi Cc I got back form Germany on Friday and have been trying to catch up with work before our trip to Alaska We leave this Sunday the th Moniques brother is going to watch the dogs while were gone so dont worry about it It sounds like youve got your hands full Its great youre buying a house We just cant seem to figure out what we want to do Monique is so stressed out with work right now Im not sure how much longer well be in Houston Did you get a good loan Did you get your truck yet Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Subject RE Hi Hi Worm Hows it going I havent heard from you in awhile What are the dates you are going to Alaska Did Mom tell you I am buying a house Well I am And it is stressing me out I have two offers on the table right now Both of the houses are cute I just cant decide which one I like better You need to come visit soon Hopefully I will be moved in when you bring Jake and Pearl up How is Mo How is work How are the dogs Let me know Love Jul
Pearl Appt PM Tuesday May th You schmell

FW TestFYI Maybe we can go into Columbus Saturday evening and stay in the country with the dogs How did you sleep last night Hope your have a better day Original Message From John Menconi mailto Sent Friday October AM To barbarb menconi Subject RE Test Rob and I had fun in CS Yes the Ags need to get better This weekend should be a huge test Mo and I would like to go to the Braden reunion but I seem to have misplaced my invite Can you sign us up Im not sure what are plan will be I think Mo has a running event on Saturday morning of the th but well talk next week Original Message From barbarb menconi mailto Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject Re Test Hi John Im glad the ags won but did they look good We need to get better yes Are you and Mo planning on coming to the Braden reunion on Sunday st Granddad is treating but were trying to determine how many Let me know Have a great week We will stay home this weekend in our own beds Love Mom Original Message From John Menconi To Mom Email Date Thursday October AM Subject Test Hey guys I got your phone message There hasnt been any change to my email so no telling what happened How is everything going For us work is work and in between is eat and sleep At least thats what it feels like sometimes Im off to College Station this weekend with Rob to watch the Aggs play Talk to you soon

Contact Info In MunichHere is the address and phone numbers for Mike Woodsy Bishop in Munich Widenmayerstr Munich Home Mobile We fly out on Thursday at PM on Air France We return on Saturday at PM on Air France
